events.name: Environmental impact assessment of graphite production for EV batteries
events.wd_label: Environmental impact assessment of graphite production for EV batteries
events.wd_description: The study assesses the greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions and environmental impacts associated with the production of graphite for lithium-ion batteries, highlighting the importance of accurate life cycle inventory (LCI) data.
events.description: The study assesses the greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions and environmental impacts associated with the production of graphite for lithium-ion batteries, highlighting the importance of accurate life cycle inventory (LCI) data.

events.name: GHG emissions from graphite production
events.wd_description: Graphite manufacturing for lithium-ion batteries is energy-intensive, primarily operated in China, resulting in high GHG emissions.
events.description: Graphite manufacturing for lithium-ion batteries is energy-intensive, primarily operated in China, resulting in high GHG emissions.

events.name: Energy-intensive processes
events.wd_description: The production of graphite involves energy-intensive processes, contributing to significant GHG emissions.
events.description: The production of graphite involves energy-intensive processes, contributing to significant GHG emissions.

events.name: GHG emission intensity
events.wd_description: The high GHG emission intensity of electricity generation in China exacerbates the environmental impact of graphite production.
events.description: The high GHG emission intensity of electricity generation in China exacerbates the environmental impact of graphite production.

events.name: Geographic concentration
events.wd_description: The concentration of graphite production in China with its lower energy prices and high emission intensity affects the global environmental impact.
events.description: The concentration of graphite production in China with its lower energy prices and high emission intensity affects the global environmental impact.

events.name: Data transparency and quality
events.wd_description: Industrial scale primary data related to the production of battery materials lacks transparency and is often outdated or incomplete.
events.description: Industrial scale primary data related to the production of battery materials lacks transparency and is often outdated or incomplete.

events.name: Data gaps
events.wd_description: Existing life cycle inventory datasets for graphite production are incomplete and not representative of current practices.
events.description: Existing life cycle inventory datasets for graphite production are incomplete and not representative of current practices.

events.name: Life cycle inventory (LCI) data
events.wd_description: The importance of accurate and up-to-date LCI data for robust evaluations of the environmental impacts of battery materials.
events.description: The importance of accurate and up-to-date LCI data for robust evaluations of the environmental impacts of battery materials.

events.name: Data quality improvement
events.wd_description: Efforts to improve the quality and transparency of LCI data for graphite production.
events.description: Efforts to improve the quality and transparency of LCI data for graphite production.

events.name: Comprehensive LCA of graphite production
events.wd_description: Conducting a life cycle assessment (LCA) of graphite production, providing detailed environmental impact data and recommendations for improvement.
events.description: Conducting a life cycle assessment (LCA) of graphite production, providing detailed environmental impact data and recommendations for improvement.

events.name: Environmental impact assessment
events.wd_description: Assessing the environmental impacts of graphite production, including material, water, and energy flows, and direct emissions.
events.description: Assessing the environmental impacts of graphite production, including material, water, and energy flows, and direct emissions.

events.name: Uncertainty analysis
events.wd_description: Performing a Monte-Carlo-Analysis to account for uncertainties in the LCA results for graphite production.
events.description: Performing a Monte-Carlo-Analysis to account for uncertainties in the LCA results for graphite production.

events.name: Recommendations for improvement
events.wd_description: Providing recommendations for reducing the environmental impacts of graphite production based on LCA findings.
events.description: Providing recommendations for reducing the environmental impacts of graphite production based on LCA findings.
